entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
